content:
assistant> Hello! I’m your AI guide for building a doodle caption. I’m designed to ask you questions and guide your reasoning but if you want to take control of your own creative process, I’ll be happy to help wherever possible.
user> Howdy!!

Using a friendly and inviting tone, like the one you see in the conversation so far, enhances engagement and makes the observer more comfortable expressing their thoughts about the droodle. This approach encourages a collaborative atmosphere, prompting deeper reflection and observation of the image, which is crucial for creative output.
